mapper.insert: insert into class_resources(c_id, user_id, resource_address) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{userId}, #{resourceAddress})

c_id = #{courseId},

mapper.select: select cc.id id, cc.c_id courseId, c.course_name courseName, cc.user_id userId, ui.name userName, cc.resource_address resourceAddress from class_resources cc left join course c on c.id = c.c_id left join user_info ui on ui.id = c.user_id
